title: CH445 - Wing Chair Premium Leather/Black
body: Cozy up the look of your home with Hans Wegner’s Wing Chair, one of his best known pieces. The Wing Chair is born in 1960 like other of his best chairs, sculptural lines allow it to stand on its own in a variety of settings. Simple looking at it may seem, the design of the backrest and the seat enables a variety of positions that always provides comfort and excellent support for the back, shoulders, neck and head. Since the front legs is higher than the back legs, the chair gives an ideal pitch.
